itemDisplayName: Secure Azure Machine Learning deployments in Azure Gov
description: This set of Bicep templates demonstrates how to set up Azure Machine Learning end-to-end in a secure set up. This reference implementation includes the AzureML workspace, a configurable compute cluster, compute instance, private AKS cluster, and (optional) Synapse Spark pool.
summary: Bicep scripts to deploy a fully functional Azure Machine Learning workspace in Azure Government and USSec.
